other_title: デ・ジ・キャラット サマースペシャル2000 (Japanese)
plot: Pyocola Analogue III, Pyoko, the leader of the Black Gema-Gema Group, the group who tried to invade planet Digi Charat, comes to Earth to kidnap Dejiko and hold her for ransom. After a failed attempt to kidnap Dejiko, Pyoko decides to cause trouble for the gang and their store Gamerz. If things were not bad enough, a slug-man appears throughout the shenanigans to add to the problems.
ending_theme: "Powerful Summer (パワフルサマー)" by Asami Sanada, Miyuki Sawashiro, and Kyoko Hikami
